And they never seem to have an explanation for the huge number of HSUS employees who have pets of their own, and are fiercely devoted to them.Â Do you honestly believe these people would support and work for an organization that wanted to take their pets away?
And people like "njcatlover" expect to be taken seriously after Vomiting up paranoid lunacy like that...
